mdRecord.dcterms:description: [misidentified as top shelf] Reference to final exams, Greek society initials, offer of sex by calling a certain telephone number, insult to a person. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Finals 2010 | ZΨ | ★ FREE SEX [scribbled out]! [a telephone number] ★ | DYL SUCKS |
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Invective
Education, Higher
Greek letter societies
Sex
